definition: hair/drawing brush/(in the) least/one thousandth/currency unit, 0.1 yuan
roof tile/abbr. for 瓦特[wa3 te4]

sentences.english: Right now, Hockaday's prototypes put out only a few milli- watts of power.
sentences.chinese: 現在，霍克蒂的燃料電池原型只能輸出幾毫瓦的電力。

sentences.english: Maximum thermal dissipation of the slot in Milliwatts.
sentences.chinese: 以毫瓦表示的插槽的最大溫度散發。

sentences.english: So far they have been able to harvest up to 5 milliwatts.
sentences.chinese: 到目前爲止，他們已經可以收集5毫瓦的最大容量。

sentences.english: dBm is the power ratio in decibels of the radio power per one milliwatt.
sentences.chinese: dBm是每毫瓦特的電磁波產生的功率。

sentences.english: This article presents the development of a milliwatt ultrasound power measurement system.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了一種毫瓦級超聲功率測量計的研製。

sentences.english: The effective radiated power does not exceed 10mW.
sentences.chinese: 有效輻射功率不超過10毫瓦。

definition: nanosecond, ns, 10^-9 s (PRC)/Taiwan equivalent: 奈秒[nai4 miao3]
micron (one thousandth of a millimeter or 10^-6 meter)
Hertz (name)/Heinrich Hertz (1857-1894), German physicist and meteorologist, pioneer of electromagnetic radiation
